Uses of Class
edu.ucla.belief.ace.Variable

    • Uses of Variable in edu.ucla.belief.ace

      Methods in edu.ucla.belief.ace that return Variable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Variable OnlineEngine.varForName(java.lang.String n)
      Returns the variable having the given name.
      Methods in edu.ucla.belief.ace that return types with arguments of type Variable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Variable> OnlineEngine.variables()
      Returns an unmodifiable set of the variables.
      java.util.HashMap<Variable,double[]> OnlineEngine.varMarginals(java.util.Set<Variable> vs)
      Invokes varMarginals(Variable) for each given variable and returns the results.
      java.util.HashMap<Variable,double[]> OnlineEngine.varPartials(java.util.Set<Variable> vs)
      Invokes varPartials(Variable) for each given variable and returns the results.
      java.util.HashMap<Variable,double[]> OnlineEngine.varPosteriors(java.util.Set<Variable> vs)
      Invokes varPosteriors(Variable) for each given variable and returns the results.
      Methods in edu.ucla.belief.ace with parameters of type Variable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Evidence.valCommit(Variable v, int u, boolean allow)
      Asserts that the given variable may or may not assume the given value, according to the given boolean.
      void Evidence.varCommit(Variable v, int u)
      Commits the given variable to the given value.
      double[] OnlineEngine.varMarginals(Variable v)
      Returns the marginal Pr (X, e) for the given network variable X, where e is defined by the most recent invocation of assertEvidence ().
      double[] OnlineEngine.varPartials(Variable v)
      For each value of the given network variable, returns the partial derivative of the ac with respect to the indicator for this value, according to the most recent invocation of assertEvidence ().
      double[] OnlineEngine.varPosteriors(Variable v)
      Returns the posterior marginal Pr (X | e) for the given network variable X, where e is defined by the most recent invocation of assertEvidence ().
      void Evidence.varRetract(Variable v)
      Retracts evidence on the given variable.
      Method parameters in edu.ucla.belief.ace with type arguments of type Variable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Invokes varMarginals(Variable) for each given variable and returns the results.
      java.util.HashMap<Variable,double[]> OnlineEngine.varPartials(java.util.Set<Variable> vs)
      Invokes varPartials(Variable) for each given variable and returns the results.
      java.util.HashMap<Variable,double[]> OnlineEngine.varPosteriors(java.util.Set<Variable> vs)
      Invokes varPosteriors(Variable) for each given variable and returns the results.
